[#bird-activity-type_site-visit]
====== Site visit

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:vertebrate-fauna-bird-survey-protocol-shapes:bird-activity-type:site-visit`
|Label | Site visit
|Definition | Observations _MUST_ have a value for `tern:hasSiteVisit`.
|Comment | Observations following the Bird survey protocol are made in the context of a site visit.
